SQLite3Database
+++++++++++++++

.. contents :: 

Summary
=======

``sqlite3`` driver for the DatabasePipe package

Get Started
===========

* Download and install from source

Author
======

`James Gardner <http://jimmyg.org/>`_

Changes
=======

0.2.0
-----

2010-09-01
~~~~~~~~~~

* Updated requirements to work with DatabasePipe 2.2.0

0.1.0
-----

2009-12-24
~~~~~~~~~~

* First version
